name: letterboxd_scrape_popular
description: Scrape popular films on Letterboxd this week.

steps.code: const films = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('li.poster-container')).slice(0,30).map((el,i) => { const img = el.querySelector('img'); const poster = el.querySelector('div.film-poster'); const slug = poster?poster.getAttribute('data-film-slug'):''; return { rank: i+1, title: img?img.getAttribute('alt'):'', url: slug?'https://letterboxd.com/film/'+slug+'/':'' }; }).filter(f=>f.title); return { films, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: page_data
